title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Mar 25 TU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Tuesday, 25 March 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Tuesday, March 25 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers the latest effort by the police state to intimidate the public with low flying helicopters. He also takes a look at an obscene comment by Rep. Josh Miller in response to defenders of the Second Amendment and the Bill of Rights. 

Investigative journalist Greg Palast talks with Alex about the role of British Petroleum in the devastating Exxon Valdez disaster 25 years ago. Palast is the author of a number of books, including The Best Democracy Money Can Buy and Vultures Picnic. 

Alex also talks with Florida attorney Todd Allen, who represented a couple who sued Bank of America after it tried to incorrectly foreclose on their home. After demonstrating in court they owned the home and did not owe the bank, Bank of America refused to pay attorney fees and other costs associated with the case.
